General.Name: Dong Yang Pipe
General.Description: Dong Yang Steel Pipe Co., Ltd. Produces and sells steel pipes in South Korea. It offers extruded polyethylene coated steel pipes; polyurea coated steel pipes for water works; steel pipes for oil and gas transport; coated and wrapped steel pipes for water services; and steel pipe piles. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Cheonan, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Kyu-Jin  Han
1.Title: Managing Director, Production Director, Director of Sales & Marketing and Director
